website_summaries.verdict: The blacklight feature on this 10 gallon tank is perfect for bringing out the colors of GloFish.
pros: Whisper filter is very quiet when set up correctly
Comes with plants to put in the aquarium
Includes both black light and white light for a cool effect with GloFish
cons: This tank comes with a heater, but the quality is not great, and you may want to consider getting another heater for your tank

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to spend more....
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all. The tube does not come with an extension so it will reach the bottom like it should. If you try to contact Tetra they will not sell the extension like it says in the instructions. You cannot buy it like the 30/40 whisper. You have to buy the entire internal pump system x2 in order to get the proper length. That’s on top of spending what you spend here. This is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Vibrant!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My tank arrived and was beyond my expectations!!! Very good quality!!! The filter is so quiet, you cannot tel it's even on!!! Love everything about it and my fishes seem to enjoy it very much! The led light bar gives the tank a very unique and awesome look as well!!! Would definitely recommend this to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: shaunlovesl

customer_reviews.title: Overall very pleased since 8/24/15
customer_reviews.text: Great tank for a 6 year old. The filter works wonderfully. I must admit I didn't think I would need a bubbler but before I used it, the tank would get stagnant and cloudy. Now that I am using it, it's like there is a current and the water is constantly moving so it all moves through the filter and keeps the water clear and clean. Maintenance isn't bad if you get a syphon and change half the water every couple of weeks
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Fish tank kit is over 2 years old and all products expired
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the box I noticed the product was from 2018. After reviewing the products and tank. All of the food, conditioner and the safe start was all expired. I am amazed that Amazon would sell a product like this to there customer and not realize It’s been expired now for almost a year. This product will be returned back to amazon and hopefully on the new order it will be up to date if not will return as well for a full refund. Also tank is not well made as the silicon seems to be all over the place. Just upsetting as this was for the kids and now I have to wait another three days for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Already have it on my Wish List but need to contact Manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with my 20 gallon GloFish Aquarium. It is exactly as I had pictured it in my mind. I purchased this on May 6, 2018. I am sure this is not a common problem but my filter stopped filtering on June 1, 2018. I am sure this is a few in a 1,000,000 chance and I in no way am putting down this product to anyone. I have it on my Wish List again. I just know that my aquarium is under warranty and I am unsure how to contact the company of my problem. Again, I love the product but problems happen.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Noble

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want your fish to die
customer_reviews.text: I'm upset about this stupid tank. The filter is GARBAGE. I've only had the tank for 2 months and the filter has NEVER worked right. I only need the low flow because I have ONE fish and the high flow is too powerful. I will be buying a completely different brand. Because of this filter, my fish will likely die and I do put that on this company. HORRIBLE craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: D'kyn Fehr

customer_reviews.title: Bad filter, dead fish
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 5/13/20 FILTER QUIT WORKING. FISH DYING. LASTED 1 MONTH DO NOT BUY. WOULD NOT BUY AGAIN. IF ONE ITEM FAILS, YOU HAVE TO DRAIN THE TANK. SAVE YOURSELF A MIGRAINE AND DONT TAKE A CHANCE This came with everything you need. Set up was less than an hour.. I bought another filter to go with it.. An under gravel filter.. The included filter is a cinch to change charcoal bag... BUT IT'S VERY NOISY AND A PAIN IN THE BUTT TO PRIME...... The plastic plants glow well with the blue leds. The tank is well made.. The heater is 100 Watts. Be sure to rinse EVERYTHING before placing in the tank. Filter BROKE
customer_reviews.author: CRAIG ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: you killed my fish.
customer_reviews.text: i followed the instructions to a t. i went the extra mile, i made sure there was no ammonia or nitrite, i made sure everything was correct and still i woke up to my babies floating at the top of what was supposed to be their comfy new home full of free roaming space. i even acclimated them to the water condition, not just the temperature and they still died. i loved and still love them. you killed my fish.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Good set up for the price. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Great set up for the price. Light is really for a ten gallon... the white part of the light was plenty bright for the tank but the blue failed to light it ip enough. The clips to hold the light in place are useless. Other thsn these issues.... i was glad for the decor , heater, and filter. Lid is good enough for me as well. Used the tank to rehome a couple of good size angels. They seem to love it too . I used four five pound bags of Walmart gravel.
customer_reviews.author: heather soule

customer_reviews.title: This a
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing fish tank. Of coarse spending extra on fish and accesories will be the customers responsibility. I purchased a little 5 gallon heater for this will be needed for this fish that glow. As you can see in the picture I used colorful rocks and plants which glow under the LED lights very nicely. The tank comes with a very nice bubble free water filter system which is super quiet. The tank took one day to set up first then added fish after 30 hours of it running. Three fish were added and they seem to love it. Works and looks great. Thanks to Amazon for having a great price on this.
customer_reviews.author: Charles BridgTec

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners kit except for the anemone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Xmas 2015. Everything is perfect except for the anemone. It started to get a flaky residue on it withing two weeks of placing in the tank. I thought it was debris from the fish, however, upon closer inspection it was the ornament itself. the same thing happened to another ornament I bought separately (Tetra 26652 Blooming Collection White Anemone and Tetra 26649 Wonderland Collection Blue Anemone). Other than that the aquarium kit is great. Good filter etc. Perfect for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Shirvan Ramjit

customer_reviews.title: My Glofish
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting Glofish ever since I found out they exist. I think this is a very good started kit and has most everything needed to get your tank started. I wasn't real excited about the plants except for the bright yellow ball thing. I put it in the front and it moves with the water currents. This is a great choice if you are interested in Glofish. It is also reasonably priced for what you get in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Leaking!
customer_reviews.text: Leaking after 5 months... Woke in the middle of the night and fish were in 3" of water and floor was saoked! Probably to late to warranty. Sad...
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Anne

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected . . .
customer_reviews.text: This is way better than I expected it to be and if you knew me, then you'd know that's about the biggest compliment I can give anything. Initially, I set up the Whisper Filter wrong so it was somewhat loud and did not work properly BUT once I finally figured out how to set it up properly, it's been perfect. So, if you see any complaints about the filter being loud or not working properly, then more than likely the person complaining actually set it up wrong like I did initially.
customer_reviews.author: Austin D. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Aquarium leaked in middle of the night
customer_reviews.text: At first we liked this product, but last night we woke up to water all over the floor. The fish were too stressed with the low water level and died. There's no way to contact the seller either about this. Would like a full refund if I could contact the seller. Very disappointed. We purchased in December and was setup for Christmas for our daughter. Didn't even last 4 months with water in it before leaking in 2 different areas. Also have baseboard damage now that I need to repair. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit! Easy and simple!
customer_reviews.text: It is my son's first aquarium! And it came with everything you need to set it up. It looks great, and my six years old loves it! It came with some plants, the filter box, the heater, and the top with hinges, so easy. I just got the rocks, some other decorations and the fishes. It has a great price and it is a pretty nice size. I did not want to go look for everything separately so I love this kit!
customer_reviews.author: Cinthya

customer_reviews.title: Great on the bar!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this really nice little $40 tank only thing is I wish it did have multiple colored lights other than just blue but share easy enough to add some as I say I am a bartender and guess where I put the aquarium? Right next to the money! Cash box! Doe scoots 10 hours pesos cool Tank Man however I don't go with the GloFish and no I'm not with Peta but I think injecting anything with anything is crazy been there done that sober for years 3 months smoke a bowl look at the aquariums it's safer don't drink and drive bartender has spoke don't trip out now?
customer_reviews.author: bartender_in_ny

customer_reviews.title: Leaking after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought in December as a gift. She set it up in February and here it’s May and it leaked all over her floors and can’t figure out where the crack or seal is messed up. And now stuck with it. Not happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah do

customer_reviews.title: Unique tank
customer_reviews.text: Works well. No back drop, You have to buy one to get the Neon to work right.(back drops are a pain to put on this tank) Hard to clean( odd shape and acrylic) But I knew this all going into the tank. Other then that,it's a great tank. Great price for all that you get. I added a air bubbler with White sand and neon blue coral. White Betta and Neon Tetras
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Tcup

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come with all necessary things to create safe environment.
customer_reviews.text: The tank is great. However, it did not come with the Safe Start Bacteria Booster stuff that the set up guide said to add before putting the fish in. Bacteria boost is very important, because good bacteria help eat the harmful chemicals that accumulate in the tank (such as ammonia). This good bacteria takes time to build up naturally in a tank. We foolishly added the fish from our old tank anyway, and lost all but one of them very quickly .(I admit part of the problem is we added them all at once). I still recommend the tank. Just know you need that booster!
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: This size of this tank is nice and its shape gives you lots of viewing area
customer_reviews.text: This size of this tank is nice and its shape gives you lots of viewing area. You will still need to purchase the following: -a heater -gravel -decorative plants -chemicals to treat the water
customer_reviews.author: Magathy

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging!
customer_reviews.text: This how this package was delivered to me. Completely torn up re-taped. Tank not in the large plastic bag. Filter and light adapter not in the box but in the bottom The only thing that was in the smaller ripped box was the filter pad. I've never had anything ever shipped to me that looks this destroyed. There are no leaks and it extremely quiet. My only issue was the packaging. Had to make sure because of the packaging that everything worked alright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought a very small aquarium as his way of deciding if an aquarium was for him. It was continually getting dirty, very quickly. He enjoyed it but thought it was to much work with cleaning it constantly. I bought this for him as a gift and he loved it! He is now an aquarium lover!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. Picture is misleading.
customer_reviews.text: I have this a two star rating because yes you get as described however the box is misleading. You would think you could have many fish I. There when really you can only have 2 or a betta. I’m sad to have been mislead. Although I do take responsibility for not reading in more depth of how many gallons to inches of fish are recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Total Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: This tank is beautiful when it is set up, however, it is a thin, plastic, piece of crap. The lid is almost impossible to get on correctly because it is so flimsy. It is not hinged and the lips of the tank are so thin that the top just sits there. The light cord and anything else you need such as a bubbler and heater, make putting the lid on impossible. The tank itself is also flimsy plastic. The only thing that makes a glotank glow, is the LED black light. you are better off buying a quality tank setup and then just buying the light separate.
customer_reviews.author: jmanrb2010

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: The kit comes with just about everything. It is missing the black background. The filter it comes with needs a longer pipe. The black light does not like to stay clipped up when the cover is opened. The plants need to be buried in the rocks or they fall over. However for the price it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Holleran

customer_reviews.title: My grandson (6) and granddaughter (16) actually enjoy them without fussing and fighting
customer_reviews.text: Well, we've had it awhile and nothing has died. We have 10 glo fish in it. When we go in the room, they all swim to that side of the tank and follow us to the other end. It is sooooooo cute. My grandson (6) and granddaughter (16) actually enjoy them without fussing and fighting. I can't believe what a great choice this is.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it.  Will require at least another $75 for fish and supplies.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for daughter and she really likes it. It currently houses three fish and I definitely wouldn't put in more than four. The lid does not cover the entire tank - about a quarter of the top is exposed near the front. Be aware that it's just a tank and light, and you will be investing another $75 or so in supplies, and then about $10/mo. in maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: madeinwa

customer_reviews.title: Killer of fish
customer_reviews.text: My fish keep dying, I at the point where I refuses to put anything in it. So i have at tank set up for absolutely no reason. It not the water either. I purchased bubble, which i turned off when i try putting a single betta in after all the danios glofish died Thing one, Thing two, Turbo, Chris, Sharky, and Delilah. Neptune the betta lasted 3 days. Very unhappy customers.
customer_reviews.author: Shoshanna

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing and mesmerizing at night!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing starter kit. Well worth the value. I did purchase this on sale, but still would be worth the value if it was not on sale. Eventually I did upgrade the heater to one that I could adjust, everything else is still being used. This is in my bedroom and has totally increased how I relax and sleep at night. Highly recommend for someone looking to get started with a tank!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: poor purchase
customer_reviews.text: this is a terrible purchase - so disappointed - I had to replace heater and pump. very poor accessories - the only part that is usable is the aquarium itself !!!!!!! it has been a few months since i rated my purchase, i stated the only usuable part was the tank itself. 2 days i came home and seal at the bottom edge of the tank had developed a terrible leak. my fish were almost completely out of water. PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM - it is a complete waste of money!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie gieck

customer_reviews.title: Neat, Be Cautious
customer_reviews.text: The kit was neat and my 8 year old birthday girl is/was very excited- That excitement has now been diminished because as cool as this was it leaks and has to be returned. So, my advice is not, to not get it-it is nice but if you are willing to take the chance don’t fill the whole thing up and completely set up everything before testing it out-
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Throw away the yellow sea anemone
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the tank and the setup. The yellow anemone turned sticky and spread a super gross sticky substance on everything it touched after about a year. Don't bother with the yellow anemone, just throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tank
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing bargain for all the right items to start a Glofish tank. Set it all up and decorated yesterday and ordered a few taller decorations. After the tank has run a few days will be adding 6 Glofish, some neon tetras, a few loaches, some snails, and two tiny frogs. Can’t wait!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie L

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price tag....
customer_reviews.text: Should be $30. Doesnt include any gravel. Super simple. Easy setup. Good if you are getting it for a little kid or someone not serious about fish. I use it to store my feather dusters in before I sell them to the fish stores. Air flow is weak. I'd justify the $50 price tag if it came with gravel and an extra filter replacement....I guess....
customer_reviews.author: magicalmidnight

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad price for what you are getting
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad price for what you are getting. The filter works great, the heater also works great. The decorations that come with it are pretty cool looking, especially the yellow anemone. The only complaint I have, is the fact that there is a 10 gal light stick that comes with it...it is a 20 gal tank and could use a bit more lighting.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: You'll have to buy another filter, know that and calculate price accordingly.
customer_reviews.text: Like the tank, hate the filter. I have two other tanks and water so much cleaner. So how about rather seeing all of us complain about your horrible filter you send us all the value of the filter as many of us either had fish killed (you should be ashamed of yourselves, imagine how many kids you have traumatized) or had to buy new filters (again, you should also be ashamed of yourselves.)
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate, GET!
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much .. I just wish I got a bigger one but only thing I changed was the filter for a better one... but it’s amazing and worth every penny for it . Some decor I got myself and 1 decor came . Everything came with it though... this thing is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Faith Janae

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, scuff marks on tank.
customer_reviews.text: The tank I got has a flimsy solid black lid, not the clear one listed in the description. I think I got someone else's return because the tank was scuffed up and the filter suction cup and filter cartridge were missing. I did not try to fill it with water because I am returning it, the blue led light works and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with box completely open and aquarium broken. Cut myself on the large jagged pieces sticking up when trying to repackage it for return.
customer_reviews.author: JMcK

customer_reviews.title: Very nice starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars but the top is very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry K. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: and we've had great luck so far
customer_reviews.text: Set up this tank in my office a few months ago with a few Glofish tetras and one African dwarf frog, and we've had great luck so far. No deaths, the filter strength is solid (a touch too strong for the frog, we've had to liberate him from the bottom of the filter twice), and no water quality issues so far. The whole thing has been a hit for people who come into the office and end up making repeat visits just to check on the tank's occupants.
customer_reviews.author: K. Casey

customer_reviews.title: It’s a fish tank
customer_reviews.text: Update this tank has started leaking water all over my floor. And of course after my return time is up so disappointed. I have well over $180 of fish in it and can’t get money back for the tank to put towards a different brand! No leaks came in one piece with everything that it said it would. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Crochet By Jems

customer_reviews.title: Heater and Filter have stopped working!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like it on picture, and it was easy to set, I enjoyed it. My first month and what not but afterwards yesterday my filter and heater stop working!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Fliter leaks water
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this tank for about a year now. For the most part its been a great inexpensive tank for my beta fish however I can no longer use the filter as water is now splashing out of the tank when it runs. Its been enough to make a huge puddle on my desk overnight and I end up needing to add more water about once a week. Overall I would recommend spending a little it more to get a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel M

customer_reviews.title: Lid needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good starter tank but the lid is a disappointment it just lays on top and keeps falling into the water if you bump the tank. The water pump is nice very quiet. Haven’t put any fish in yet but so far the only thing I would improve is the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Goldfish love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tank! I got this to upgrade some adopted deployment fish's' accommodations. It arrived with no damage, easy to put together. Easy to keep clean and it looks cool in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this tank. This is a great choice for every begginer. I bought this and I am very satisfied. But I would definitely get a different filter because the one that comes with this one is trash
customer_reviews.author: jason hamide

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Ad title, description
customer_reviews.text: Ad Description stated Glofish Aquarium Tank Kits with LED Lighting, Decor and Live Fish Collection, there was NO decor ( included a filter) and NO Live Fish Collection. Don't be mislead by incorrect Ad
customer_reviews.author: vicki andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great Tank. We didn’t want a long in width ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Tank. We didn’t want a long in width tank because it takes up too much space. This hex tank was the perfect option for us. *Purchased 3 years ago. Our yellow belly turtle is still living happily with plenty of room to dive and do his thing. We purchased another filtering system last year which is understandable as I didn’t expect the included filter to last forever. Overall it was a great purchase for us.
customer_reviews.author: bea

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tank. Pretty good deal considering you get the special blue glo light bar, filter and heater with it too. Comes with the thermometer too, which I don't remember seeing but was a plus because I didn't have to go out and get one. (LOL) The anemone is cool! I (along with our glo shark love it!) The plants aren't anything spectacular, we only used half of them. But that's okay because we had already purchased taller plants anyway.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferCornacchia

customer_reviews.title: Cool tank
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tank! Only problem had to use tape to keep the light in place & have to be very careful putting the to on - no extra allowance on edges - so it's fallen into the tank a couple times. Could be my shaky hands too!
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: Safety and  all the parts are included. This is a great vender. A
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful starter aquarium kit. Quality product. I highly recommend. This vender is awesome to order from,because if you have any problems they will help you right away!! I really appreciate that!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary flynn

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing set! Everything looks good
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing set! Everything looks good! I only have one problem, the description says "The Tetra GloFish Kit includes: one 20 Gallon Glass Aquarium, one LED hood, one Tetra Mini UL Heater, one Tetra Whisper 20 Filter, one GloFish 13" LED Light Stick, three GloFish Plants, one GloFish Yellow Anemone", but is only had two GloFish Plants.
customer_reviews.author: Airek

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A BEAUTIFUL AQUARIUM!!!  PRETTIEST ONE EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: WHAT A BEAUTIFUL AQUARIUM!!! PRETTIEST ONE EVER!! The kit is excellent, I ended up also getting the blacklight plants and gravel. The ONLY thing missing in this kit is an oxygen pump, which we were able to add our old air pump to the tank and EVEN our fish is SUPER HAPPY!! NO KIDDING. YOU CAN TELL THE FISH IS THRILLED ABOUT THE NEW TANK. The BONUS is the BLUE LED light at the top of the tank. YOU WILL NOT regret it! AAA+++
customer_reviews.author: Hector Montes De Oca

customer_reviews.title: Great learner tank for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great tank to start your little ones with. Our 6 year old has been enjoying the whole learning experience. The only thing we have had to help with is the cleaning of the tank. It’s very quiet and the set up couldn’t be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Galina and Bill

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tank!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a starter tank for Christmas and it works great! The only complaint I have is the feeding area in the front of the lid which is open and does not have anything to cover the space. One of our glow fish which are 10.00 each jumped out the first day. We have to use a piece of plastic from a cutting board to cover the feeding hole now. It would be nice to have a different lid with a part to lift up to feed. Overall, a great tank for an affordable price and small space.
customer_reviews.author: Traci01

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality filter
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a terrible filter. Despite getting new replacement parts sent to me the filter was still too loud to have in any room. Was told it is a very poor quality filter at local pet store and ended up having to buy a new one
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: and everything is good working order
customer_reviews.text: Came intact, and everything is good working order. The aquarium is crystal clear, couldn't ask for a better display of my fish.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Helberg

customer_reviews.title: Light weight easy to clean and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Great size for beginner glofish, fit five little danios in this tank along with 2 snails and fun glo decor, filter is quiet and keeps tank clean. The shape just gives it a more classy style
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Arnold

customer_reviews.title: This produce is junk
customer_reviews.text: The heater does not work and the filter is SO loud. The only way I found this out was AFTER I set the tank up. Super unhappy with this product and now I have to decide go out and buy a new filter and heater or unload 20 gallons off water, gravel and figure out what to do with my fish or keep the broken stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little fish aquarium. BUT it doesn't come with all the equipment. For starters you would need to purchase an air pump and heater.
customer_reviews.author: Brandii

customer_reviews.title: Cat and Fish Approved
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other filters, this one is pretty silent! My fish like the tank and my cat likes to watch them in it. The lid really helped the cat fur from messing with the filter. I also have a castle and some plants inside, and there are still plenty of room for my little fish!
customer_reviews.author: HaileyPetit

customer_reviews.title: Great tank
customer_reviews.text: Great tank and with everything it comes with it's worth the price. I'm very pleased. Easy set-up filter did make a lot of loud noise but after pudding down on a tube it stop now it very peaceful. My fish just love the 20 gallon
customer_reviews.author: lourdes

customer_reviews.title: 🐠
customer_reviews.text: The led light is not the one that fits on the cover . Other than that everything that is great with this product.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: One star
customer_reviews.text: I should read the negative reviews before I purchase. All bad things happened as other negative reviews said. One fish died due to the too strong filter(its body still stuck on the filter when I find it). The tank is made by cheap plastic so even single clean will leave scratches on it.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Pretty tank
customer_reviews.text: The shape is neat and it’s 5 gallons. Easy to assemble (just Clipping on led light). Pump makes a bit of noise but typical. Tank is plastic. Cover lays on top but I wish it was more secure. It moves easily.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline S

customer_reviews.title: Decent aquarium set up.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Decent sized tank for glofish. Ability to toggle between black and white light. Plants are great for making the tank more interesting for the fish given the tank size. Cons: Heater went out during the second week and became hot enough to kill the fish. A hood replacement will be in order in the future. Additional filtration would be best if you want more than a few glofish. Suggestions: Definitely buy your own glass heater and skip the plastic heater that comes with the aquarium kit. Buy a cheap thermometer that has the green strip to help you assure that the aquarium temperature remains stable.
customer_reviews.author: L. Chetty

customer_reviews.title: Too basic to work even as a kids tank.
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought for my daughter at Christmas. The Filtration needed to be upgraded because the original wasn't sufficient for 5 fish. Then the new filter leaked over the back. So we upgraded tanks. We still use the light, so at least it has that going for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Durant

customer_reviews.title: Great tank
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for our growing fishy! Quiet with bright blue light! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Glo Fish Tank
customer_reviews.text: Not the size I needed. I think you combating have warned people that only the very small Glo fish will fit in here.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great first fish tank
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it. It glows very well. Abd it's a great size tank for our five new family friends. I was also happy that it just came with the basics and wasn't with a whole bunch of things I already have like many other if the small tanks I saw.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Good for glofish
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice tank to keep glofish and other fish friends. You will need a heater. I personally didn't like the filter and switched it to another. The blue light isn't all that bright but works fine.
customer_reviews.author: sherese

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Great for Beta fish or 5 community fish, great for starting. You'll need gravel and heater. Comes with filter.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Jackson

customer_reviews.title: No gravel
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great tank itself but when I got mine it came with double the plastic plants I was suppose to get, fish flakes, and the filter. No gravel came with it and the light that comes with it doesn’t light up with one color, every other light on the bar is blue instead of the normal light And vise versa when I switch to the other setting. Idk if that’s suppose to do that or not
customer_reviews.author: Gage

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy filter
customer_reviews.text: Giving this a low review because everything comes as advertised, but the "Whisper" filter that comes with it is hella noisy. There's almost a knocking to it while runs. Very disappointed. I'll probably end up needing to buy a new filter soon.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Pauselius

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The lid keeps falling into the fish tank. That’s literally the only downfall. Otherwise it’s beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Rober B. Allen Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great tank!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this as a betta tank for 3 years and have had no problems with it! Light still works plastic hasn’t cracked at all
customer_reviews.author: rain

customer_reviews.title: Ten Gallons of enjoyment
customer_reviews.text: The tank holds the water, now I can't wait to get the fish.
customer_reviews.author: charles illingworth

customer_reviews.title: Received a broken product
customer_reviews.text: Tank filter does not work. It is loud and not filtering water through. I now have a twenty gallon tank, full of water, with no ability to put fish in, unless I want to buy another filter. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great aquarium
customer_reviews.text: Very good aquarium have had for a couple months and works great my fish are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Levi D

customer_reviews.title: great tank to start up with
customer_reviews.text: everything was pretty good i just wish it came with an air pump
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: kit not worth it, just buy a tank and some lights
customer_reviews.text: Did NOT receive fish food and water conditioner sample as well as a set-up guide as stated. Lid is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great starter tank!
customer_reviews.text: It is great as a starter tank! I have never had one before so it is a learning experience. I needed to buy a heater, air pump, thermometer, and all the decor.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Great if you're short on space
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tank for anybody who wants a nice tank who had little space or is just starting off. I currently have 6 comet goldfish in my tank and it isn't crowded at all. Would have given it 5 stars if the filter was a little better, but it's to be expected considering that all tanks come with a filter that isn't so great. The filter is, by all means, not bad. It does get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Justin Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every thing you need to set up a neon fish tank.
customer_reviews.author: just shopping

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors!
customer_reviews.text: Hinged lid doesn't work the best. Ended up leaving one side unattached because the lid wouldn't close completely if it was attached to the back of the aquarium. Aside from that, LOVE this aquarium. Beautiful!!! Grandkids think it's really neat. Just needed a couple more plants to be complete.
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tank for my classroom and have received so many compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: momoftwo

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 2 years. Works well, but rather expensive. I believe you can get a better tank for less money. Do your research before you spend the funds.
customer_reviews.author: D. Flaten

customer_reviews.title: Greatbuy
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent starter kit if you want fish comes with almost everything
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Good tank, bad filter and heater
customer_reviews.text: The tank is fine. The heater is cheap and the filter didn't work. I bought a cheap filter and we are up and running. My Son loves the black light against his glow fish. So we are happy. Probably a 2.5
customer_reviews.author: theschlay

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts - be prepared
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts. No stick on thermometer. No starter kit. Called vendor and got everything one month after I called. They sent everything eventually but it is annoying because we could not use it until the last part came. Once we had everything it looks nice and our daughter is happy - one month after christmas. I'd give it 5 stars if eveything showed up on time.
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this fish tank!
customer_reviews.text: We assembled the tank tonight and it was very simple; taking less than 30 minutes to hook up everything. It looks fantastic! One note: If you're purchasing gravel for the bottom of the 10-gallon tank, definitely buy 15 pounds (3 bags) as it really doesn't go a long way. Can't wait to get the GloFish tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Hard to figure out
customer_reviews.text: First time fish owner. There were no directions, I ended up having to look each part in the kit individually online to figure it out. I didn’t receive some of the kit and have a filter I have no idea what to do with. Hasn’t been the best experience.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Shepperson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and a good price!
customer_reviews.text: We have a rather large goldfish that has continually outgrown our bowls. This is perfect for him. Setup was easy and it looks so good! I looked at a LOT of tanks and this one was a really good price and a quality product. Thick glass, LED lights, and easy filtration system.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Weymouth

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the price ended up upgrading the filter ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the price ended up upgrading the filter on the system but everything else seems to work well. only upgraded my filter because I have an overstocked tank
customer_reviews.author: Cody S.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use - durable - easy to clean. really good for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Larry O

customer_reviews.title: This starter kit is great.
customer_reviews.text: This starter kit is great. A good bargain to get started with.
customer_reviews.author: Hailee Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome aquarium! Perfect size for not “over-doing it”. I bought mine for my kitchen (-;
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good for the bigger Tetra type fish but not smaller glofish....
customer_reviews.text: I love this tank, it is gorgeous, however I am having problems with the smaller Glo fish getting sucked into the filter. I have lost 2 that way and I've only had the tank for 2 weeks. The bigger Tetra type fish are doing well and the little catfish I got for the bottom is doing great, and he's adorable! So I will give this 4 stars because behind the filter seems to be a death zone for the smaller guys. I also bought the bubbler with the blue lights and it gives the room a really great mellow vibe.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

product_meta.title: GloFish Aquarium Kit Fish Tank with LED Lighting and Filtration Included
product_meta.description: Size:10-Gallon"GloFish aquarium kits, lighting and décor create an underwater fluorescent wonderland that appeals to all ages and levels of expertise. With our full range of vibrant accessories uniquely designed to work with GloFish LED lighting, you can transform any aquarium into a GloFish environment at the click of a switch.The GloFish 10 Gallon Aquarium Kit includes a 10 gallon glass aquarium, low profile hood with LED energy efficient lighting, unique combination of white and blue LED lights give both GloFish and tropical fish and vibrant look, Tetra Whisper power filter with cartridge,50-watt aquarium heater and thermometer, fish food and water conditioner sample and set-up guide. Watch as your aquarium is transformed into an underwater wonderland filled with pops of brilliant color. Watch as your GloFish and GloFish decor fluoresce in brilliance underwater. Create an eye catching space that reflects your personality in true color. "
feature_bullets: INCLUDES ALL THE ESSENTIALS FOR SUCCESS: This GloFish aquarium kit includes a 10 gallon glass aquarium, low profile hood with LED energy efficient lighting, unique combination of white and blue LED lights give both GloFish and tropical fish and vibrant look, Tetra Whisper power filter with cartridge,50-watt aquarium heater and thermometer, fish food and water conditioner sample and set-up guide.
LED LIGHTING TRANSFORMS YOUR AQUARIUM: A combination of blue and white LED lighting to give both GloFish and tropical fish a vibrant look.
COMPLETE THE LOOK WITH COLORFUL ADDITIONS: Complete the look by adding pops of color among any gravel you choose with the varying plant sizes and colors included.
DIMENSIONS: The 20 Gallon Aquarium dimensions are 18.5 "L x 10.5"W x 13" H
